text:
T&Mfjr
February 17, 1960
Mr* Horace B. Powell
Publications Director
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Mr. Powells
Our congratulations on your very impressive
annual report for 1959.
We are pleased with the NAEB inclusions. If there is anything
we can do to be of help along these lines in the future, please
let us know.
I don't know whether or not you see copies of our publications,
as I believe they are all addressed to Mr. Seay. If not, you
might be interested in the enclosed current issue of the NAEB
Journal.
Sincerely yours.
bmck/ea
(Mrs J Betty McKenzie
Publications Editor
Enclosure
